item.title: Influencer Marketing
item.description: Notes about influencer marketing - Data, recommendations and ideas

item.title: Digital Garden
item.description: A Digital Garden/Zettelkasten is a personal tool for thinking and writing. It has hypertextual features to make a web of thought possible. The difference to other systems is that you create a web of thoughts instead of notes of arbitrary size and form, and emphasize connection, not a collection.

item.title: stultus
item.description: ‘Stultus’ is a Latin word and it means ‘Stupid/Foolish’. And I use this as my pseudonym
